subject: Good News.
body:
Good News.
Finally, you have been considered as one of the  victim of unpaid,
inheritance,lottery,contract payment funds owed for many years ago,
after empty promises from diffident  corrupt individuals from
different organizations and so,  finally your prayers has been
answered and  you are hereby advise as matter of urgency to contact,
Director of payment,Foreign Payment Center LONDON, UK , Mr. Roland
Peter through their  Private  address below:
Foreign Payment center.
Address: London EC1A 2BN, United Kingdom
Private email address: 
mrpeterroland@outlook.com
Director: Mr. Peter Roland.
Regards,
Mr Philip Jacob

subject: Re:    Good News.
body:
Dear Mr. Philip Jacob,

Thank you for your email and the good news about the unpaid funds. Could you please provide more details about this matter? Specifically, I would like to know the exact amount that is owed to me, the reason for this payment, and any necessary steps I need to take in order to receive it.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kathryn
